text: Alan Kupperberg (May 18, 1953 â€“ July 16, 2015) was an American comic artist. He was known for working in both comic books and newspaper strips. He began writing and drawing for Marvel Comics in 1974. Kupperberg has done illustrations for Archie Comics, National Lampoon, Cracked magazine, Spy, and McClannahan Books. Kupperberg died in New York City from thyroid cancer, aged 62. ==References== ==Other websites== *Alan Kupperberg at Mike's Amazing World of Comics *Alan Kupperberg at the Unofficial Handbook of Marvel Comics Creators Category:1953 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer Category:American comics artists Category:People from New York City
title: Alan Kupperberg
